thread.title: LSE group chief operating officer to join State Street
thread.title_full: LSE group chief operating officer to join State Street

author: Financial News
title: LSE group chief operating officer to join State Street
text:
Follow @_TimCave 19 October 2015 The London Stock Exchange's chief operating officer and chief information officer has resigned and is set to join State Street, in what would be the second departure from the UK exchange group's senior executive team this year.
